content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the specific social media strategy of a particular organization. However, in general, social media platforms that are popular among the younger generation such as Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat are often used by organizations to reach their core audience. LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook are also used for more professional or broader outreach. Ultimately, the choice of social media platforms will depend on the organization's target audience and goals.
